text: Titia moi singhason khan dikhise. Ta te taikhan bohise- sob atma khan kun laga matha khan Jisu laga gawahi aru kotha nimite kati dise, aru kunkhan janwar aru tai laga murti ke puja kora nai aru matha age te aru hathte tai laga chihna luwa nai- taikhan ke bisar korise. Taikhan jinda hoi jaise, aru Khrista logote hajar saal raj korise.
